phrases: your favorite soccer team won, did not they?

so maybe she just needed a little help getting back into her natural state.

but these days, I think I am beginning to see her smile more often.

but that is not the issue at hand!

Now, now, where is the harm?

and she just got Miyamoto to ask in her place?

I cannot look him in the face!
It is going to be okay!
Remember, your house is the headquarters of a yakuza clan, the Shuei-gumi!
I am sure she is just super nervous!
What is got you worked up?
I am not jittery, or excited, or anything!
Oh, so you were excited, then?
I-I cannot help it, can I?
I have never been to a study group with my friends before.
Is it a bad thing for me to get excited?

Hey, I have not been in here in ages, either.
And it kind of smells funny.

Young Master, your tea is ready!

And do not you dare come back!
P-Please show me how to do this problem!
Onodera and I are so close!
My heart's pounding so hard that math is the last thing on my mind!
The sound of my heartbeat is unbelievable!
I bet even Onodera can hear it!
Anyway, the fact is she is asking me for help.
So I got to play it cool, and...

She assigned us three worksheets for homework
And here I thought that I had the upper hand in schoolwork!

Hey, Onodera, I am pretty good with schoolwork.

Your explanation makes so much sense!
Kirisaki, you will pay for this...
Do you have a crush on anybody?

Right now, I do not think of anyone like that.

I do not have anyone like that now, either!
I really hope I can meet that special someone soon.
But it is just so hard, you know?

How could you get a girlfriend before me?!
That was about when I figured it out.
That was right at the beginning!

Well, do you really think I could have resisted the urge?
This is why I did not want to tell him!
So, you would rather not have Onodera actually fall for your act the whole three years, if at all possible.
Then, hey, it could not be any simpler.
Just tell her how you feel!

very far in their relationship, eh?

I really cannot figure you out...

so it is not like we could not get out if we put our minds to it.
Thanks to my guys, we are stuck.
Hey, you have been unusually quiet for the last few minutes...
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey!
Just be quiet for a minute!
And if you look at me, I will smash your face in, got it?
I told you I would smash your face in if you looked at me, did not I?
I have been afraid of dark, cramped spaces since I was little.
A long time ago I got stuck inside a washing machine and could not move for five hours.
I-I am not clinging to you because I want to!
I-It is all I can do to keep myself calm.
If you get the point, then just shut up and let me keep clinging!
She is totally different from her usual self!
Who knew that she had this side to her?
I finally realize that she is just like any other girl.
Until this moment, I would never really thought of her as one, but...
What am I going to do?
I can hear the whisper of her breath!
Her eyes... are glistening with tears.
Damn, her eyes are so big, they are adorable.
There is the scent of a shampoo I have never smelled before as well.
Plus, I can feel her warmth on my back!
Her lips are sparkling... and they look so soft... for some reason.
I know I have ignored her till now, but this girl's pretty hot!
Wait, what the hell am I thinking?
When I have already decided who to give my heart toOnodera!

came to a close, as I somehow lost many things that were important to me.
